channel.title: Pull requests about naming of files
channel.description:
Recent pull requests (https://github.com/Whonix/whonix-libvirt/pulls) would break the build script: - https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/build-steps.d/1150_export-libvirt-xml - https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/help-steps/variables#L285
...because build-steps.d/1150_export-libvirt-xml (help-steps/variables) doesn't distinguish fedora vs debian archives. Needs more work.

item.title: Pull requests about naming of files
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes.

If you want them for Whonix 10 + 1 or w/e, this still needs work. You can contribute this any time. Since Whonix 10 is now on its own git branch, there is no issue with merging stuff into git master.

Read full topic
item.source: Pull requests about naming of files

item.title: Pull requests about naming of files
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
These problems are not important for holding back Whonix 10 and because its not based on Jessie. The Debian file works with Jessie.

Read full topic

  • https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/blob/master/help-steps/variables#L285

…because build-steps.d/1150_export-libvirt-xml (help-steps/variables) doesn’t distinguish fedora vs debian archives. Needs more work.
